Percent of bachelor's degrees awarded women in 1970 versus 1990

Format

A data frame with 11 observations on the following 3 variables.

Field
a factor with levels All fields Business Education Engineering Fine Arts Foreign Lng Health Life Sciences Physical Sci Psychology Social Science
X1970
a numeric vector
X1990
a numeric vector
======= A data frame with 1064 observations on the following two variables.
field
a factor with levels Health, Education, Foreign Language, Psychology, Fine Arts, Life Sciences, Business, Social Science, Physical Sciences, Engineering, and All Fields
awarded
a factor with levels 1970 and 1990

======= T1 <- xtabs(~field + awarded, data = Degree) T1 barplot(t(T1), beside = TRUE, col = c("red", "skyblue"), legend = colnames(T1))
